title: lolclient.exe is gone and cant open league when i click the ''launch'' button
body:
Hello guys, when i open league launcher and press ''launch''. nothing happens and i wont get the log in client...
someone pls help me to solve this issue bc i am trying to solve it for the past 6 hours already....

replies.body: League needs to launch through the patch in order to login, so using another way may not work properly.  It sounds like your patcher might be unable to launch due to a permission or OS setting issue.  I recommend going over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to give the patcher access to launch.  This should get you fixed up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lvIxuOMo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-03T16:49:55.129+0000)
>
> League needs to launch through the patch in order to login, so using another way may not work properly.  It sounds like your patcher might be unable to launch due to a permission or OS setting issue.  I recommend going over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to give the patcher access to launch.  This should get you fixed up!

hey thanks, but i cant find ''LolClient.exe in the air client/deploy map

No worries, we have some resources that may help with this.  When you have some time, run our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to get your game files back in order.  If you're still having issues after using the tool, feel free to hit us up in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will respond asap!
so this means that i need to installl it so you guys can see whats wrong wiht it and send me what to do?

The hextech repair tool needs to be installed and will appear on your desktop.  It has a variety of automatic repair options, but it also gathers a set of logs that you can attach to your ticket and provided context to your specific issue.
i submitted a request to the Riot Games Support and i added the logs from the Hextech Repair Tool to my request, right this way?
Perfect!  Thanks for doing all of that.  We'll respond asap!
i still dont have a reply... i want to play leaaaaguee
thanks for the help, i hope i will get a solution

Hey after you press launch do the following steps:
Right click your league icon, and press "open file location"
Then press Rads
Then Press Projects
Then Press Lol air client
Then Releases 
Click the most recent patch
Deploy
Finally click LolClient with the blue icon.
pls tell em what i can do to find my lolcline.exe or get it to work
i cant find the LolClient, its not there...

Delete the game and reinstall it. 

>control panel
>programs
>uninstall a program
>League of Legends
